text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now then, where to next?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Well, well. Here's an unusual customer.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Student council going so well today 
you came to gaze at the clouds?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha, do I really look that amused to you? 
No, I'm actually hard at work on an important job.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Important job, huh. If you're saying 
that, it must be pretty complicated.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Earlier today, the chairman called me in…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You want us, the student council, to 
work on the Tracen Academy pamphlet?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! I would like to propose "the high-spirited side of 
the student body" as theme for the new school year's pamphlet.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Challenge! If we were to continue to repeatedly showcase 
the same student body, I fear that we will remain stagnant!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Proposal! Thus, I would like the current active members 
of the student body to work together to create the new 
pamphlet by all means necessary!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I understand that you are all extremely busy and for that I do 
apologize! However, it is for the future of the academy, and that 
of all horsegirls as well; their glorious races depend on you.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Please, will you lend me your abilities?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And there you have it. Before I start, I wanted 
to take a good look at the academy.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Their future races, huh? In that case, you mind if I tag along?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …! Well, well. I wasn't expecting you to say something like that.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
You said you wanted a new "high spirited side of 
the student body?" Give me some time to prepare. 
Then, let's make a great pamphlet together.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: C.B. if you're going to… She's already gone.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Well then. I wonder if she will be here this morning.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: UOOOOHHHHHHH!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Fufu, well well.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff. Hehe, I'm warmed up now!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff. Just one more lap!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: UOHHHHHH! Today is the day I will shake you off!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I see what's going on now. In that 
case, maybe it's time for me to step in.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff! I'm not done yet!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Hey! Ace!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: C.B.?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Instead of just racing an imaginary version of me, how about 
running against the real thing! I'll take you on for real!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Ha ha ha! Bring it! If you think you can take me on, just try me!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Now you're talking.

text_block_list.name: C.B. & Ace
text_block_list.text: HAHHHHHHHHHH!

text_block_list.name: C.B. & Ace
text_block_list.text: Ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Pwahhhhh! Ah, I lost again!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
But man, you're something else C.B. Just know that I 
definitely won't lose next time. Got that!?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Sure, but I'll still win again.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Ha ha! Well said! Alright! Today I'm going 
to step up my training! Let's do this!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Yup, Ace is definitely a good choice. Hey, there's 
something I'd actually like your help with.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Oh? Haven't really heard you asking for help before. What's up?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Well, you see…
